column1: '''Many Meetings''' is the ninth track of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack]]'' by [[Howard Shore]].  It is played during the beginnings of the Hobbits' time in [[Rivendell]].
The track begins with the Rivendell theme: the regular
column2: somewhat mysterious arpeggios in strings and reeds with steady
column3: high vocals.  It smoothly turns into the Shire "[[In Dreams]]" theme
column4: dropping the vocals.  This quickly turns into a single clarinet playing the syncopated variant.  All this time the music stays smooth and quiet.  The strings take over the melody
column5: while the brass plays softly in the background in unsually long notes.  The clarinet plays the syncopated rhythm again
column6: but it doesn't last as long
column7: and merges back into a flute playing the Rivendell theme with the steady vocals.  The music again returns to the "In Dreams" theme on strings.  It ends on a long note of strings that fades out.
